thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Mr David Pearson
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Mr David Pearson

author: Mr David Pearson
title: Mr David Pearson
text: This was the only place i could find the football boots i wanted in my size. The price was very reasonable. However s week later and i am still waiting for my boots to arrive as UK mail have still got my boots. Hopefully i can collect them from my local depot before training starts!!!
